markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wind Caller](/Feats.aspx?ID=334) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 137 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[storm order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

You bid the winds to lift and carry you through the air. You gain the [_stormwind flight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=478) order spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

<title level="2">Wind Caller leads to...</title>
[Invoke Disaster](/Feats.aspx?ID=350)
name: Wind Caller
